body: Some druids emulate the deadly shark, a remorseless hunter that marine dwellers dread. Like a true shark, a shark shaman leaves blood and fear in her wake.
name: Shark Shaman
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Shark Shaman

sections.body: A shark shaman who chooses an animal companion must select a shark. If choosing a domain, a shark shaman may choose the Animal, Death, War, or Water domain.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Shark Shaman/Nature Bond
sections.name: Nature Bond

sections.body: A shark shaman can use wild empathy with fish as a full-round action with a +4 bonus.
sections.name: Wild Empathy
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Shark Shaman/Wild Empathy

sections.body: At 2nd level, a shark shaman may adopt an aspect of the shark while retaining her normal form. This ability functions as the dragon shaman's totem transformation ability, but the druid may select from the following bonuses: movement (can breathe water, swim speed 30 feet), senses (scent 30 feet, scent 90 feet in water), natural weapons (bite 1d6 for a Medium shaman), or shark skin (+2 natural armor, creatures grappling the shaman take 1 point of slashing damage per round of grapple). While using totem transformation, the shark shaman may speak normally and can cast speak with animals (fish only) at will.
sections.name: Totem Transformation
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Shark Shaman/Totem Transformation

sections.body: At 5th level, a shark shaman may use summon nature's ally I to summon a stingray and summon nature's ally II to summon a manta ray. She may cast summon nature's ally as a standard action when summoning rays and sharks, and summond rays and sharks gain a number of temporary hit points equal to her druid level. This ability otherwise functions as the dragon shaman's totemic summons ability.
sections.name: Totemic Summons
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Shark Shaman/Totemic Summons

sections.body: At 6th level, a shark shaman's wild shape ability functions at her druid level –2. If she takes on the form of a shark, she instead uses her druid level +2.
sections.name: Wild Shape
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Shark Shaman/Wild Shape

sections.body: At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, a shark shaman gains one of the following bonus feats: Bleeding Critical, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Self-Sufficient, or Skill Focus (Swim). She must meet prerequisites for these bonus feats. This ability replaces venom immunity.

sections.name: Bonus Feat
